item.title: Proving the Central Limit Theorem using R
item.description: Proving the Central Limit Theorem using R Mastering Metrics by Joshua D. Angrist & John-Steffen Pischke provides a wonderful explanation of the Central Limit Theorem illustrated by a dummy variable indicating sick vs healthy individuals, the latter who account for 80% of a population: The distribution of this dummy variable has two spikes, one of height .8 at the value 1 and one of height .

item.title: new blog location
item.description: Hey All - I have a few new ideas for little data projects and will be posting here from now on. Eventually this will be louismaiden.com. Louis
